players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob killed Charlie. I'm the detective and found Bob is mafioso. Be cautious."
Bob: "I'm the mafioso. Stay cautious, tonight Charlie was my target."
You: "I'm keeping an eye on Bob and Diana. Any suspicious behavior could be mafia."
You: "Cautiously monitoring Bob & Diana. Stay alert."
Diana: "Bob confessed he's mafia. Watch him closely, night actions are coming."
Bob: "Cautiously watching both Diana & Alice. Stay vigilant."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

Alice: "Cautiously monitoring Bob & Diana. Stay alert."
